headline: A Look at M&T Bank’s (MTB) Valuation Following a Recent 3% Share Price Rise
summary: M&T Bank (MTB) shares edged higher today, gaining just over 3% at the close. Investors are keeping an eye on the stock’s current performance, considering recent returns over the month and the past 3 months to inform their next moves. See our latest analysis for M&T Bank. While M&T Bank shares have pushed higher recently, the bigger picture shows momentum remains mixed. Despite today’s uptick and a positive 3-year total shareholder return of 23%, the 1-year total return is still down more than...
